mapper.select: SELECT o.`identity_id` FROM `dc_org` o join `mo_org_expand` oe on o.`identity_id` = oe.`identity_id` WHERE o.`status` = 1 AND (oe.`is_public` = 1 OR `identity_id` IN ( SELECT `org_identity_id` FROM `t_user_org` WHERE `user_address` = #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}))

SELECT o.`node_name`, o.`identity_id`, oe.`identity_ip`, oe.`identity_port`, oe.`is_public` as public_flag FROM `dc_org` o join `mo_org_expand` oe on o.`identity_id` = oe.`identity_id` WHERE `status` = 1 AND (oe.`is_public` = 1 OR `identity_id` IN ( SELECT `org_identity_id` FROM `t_user_org` WHERE `user_address` = #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
